text:
View this post on Instagram
What an unforgettable & outstanding tour it's been !! Happy to have witnessed the historic victories by the men 👏 🙏 👏 HUGE congratulations 🇮🇳 And so proud of you my love @virat.kohli ❤️ 😁
A post shared by AnushkaSharma1588 (@anushkasharma) on Jan 18, 2019 at 4:12am PST
title: Soaking Up The Sun! Virat Kohli And Wifey Anushka Sharma Enjoy A Date At Australian Open 2019
description: Soaking in the sun, the lovebirds clicked a selfie togther at Australian Open 2019 in Melbourne. Like always, their fans couldn’t stop gushing. Take a look at how the couple looked ravishing twinning in white. Virat Kohli was busy with three-match ODI series against Australia. Accompanying her hubby, Anushka Sharma was seen cheering for him from the stands.
